name: Abyss, Age of Apocalypse
effect:
Loyalty
Remove Abyss from the game ---> Remove target character from the game at the start of the recovery phase this turn. Use only during the combat phase.

name: Apocalypse, Age of Apocalypse
effect:
Pay X resource points ---> Put X +1 / +1 counters on Apocalypse.
KO Apocalypse ---> You may put another Apocalypse card from your hand into play. Use only if Apocalypse has 20 or more +1 / +1 counters on him.

name: Apocalypse, Age of Apocalypse
effect: At the start of the combat phase, if you've recruited another Apocalypse this game, each player chooses a character he controls and KO's the rest.
"I am everywhere, Magneto, for I am fit. I am strong."

name: Bishop, Age of Apocalypse
effect: When Bishop enters play, you may search your deck for an Age of Apocalypse card, reveal it, and put it into your hand.
"I'll open his eyes...show him the truth."

name: Blink, Age of Apocalypse
effect: Remove Blink from the game ---> Recover target stunned [X-Men Icon] character you control. At the start of the recovery phase this turn, Blink's owner returns her to play. Use only during the combat phase.

name: Colonel America, Zombie
effect: {Activate}, KO Colonel America ---> Target attacker or defender can't be stunned this attack. At the start of the recovery phase this turn, return Colonel America from his owner's KO'd pile to play under your control.

name: Cyclops, Age of Apocalypse
effect:
Loyalty - Reveal
Cyclops enters play with a +1 / +1 counter.
{Activate}, Remove up to three +1 / +1 counters from Cyclops ---> Stun target character if its cost is equal to the number of counters removed.

name: Dark Beast, Age of Apocalypse
effect:
Discard a card ---> Put a +1 / +1 counter on Dark Beast. Use only once per turn.
Remove two +1 / +1 counters from Dark Beast ---> Draw two cards. Use only once per turn.

name: Havok, Age of Apocalypse
effect:
Havok can't be stunned while you have the initiative.
At the start of the combat phase, exhaust Havok if you don't have the initiative.
"First law of Apocalypse: Survival of the fittest."

name: Holocaust, Age of Apocalypse
effect:
Holocaust enters play with two +1/+1 counters.
Whenever Holocaust becomes stunned, you may remove all +1/+1 counters from characters in play. Target player loses 1 endurance for each counter removed.

name: Jean Grey, Age of Apocalypse
effect: {Activate}, Discard another Jean Grey card ---> Negate target effect from a non-ongoing plot twist.
"I think that in another world, things may have been different for us."

name: Magneto, Age of Apocalypse
effect:
Loyalty
Discard another Magneto card ---> Characters can't be stunned this attack. Use only if Magneto is in combat and only once per turn.
"We were the mightiest of our race, Apocalypse. Imagine a world where we were on the same side."

name: Marvel Zombies
effect:
Choose a character you control.
Ongoing:That character gains the version Zombie.
KO or stun a character you control. Recover target stunned Zombie character. Use only once per turn and only during the recovery phase.

name: Mikhail Rasputin, Age of Apocalypse
effect: Discard a card ---> Put a +1 / +1 counter on target [Horsemen of Apocalypse Icon] character you control.
"Change is in the air; like dawn into day. Shadows fell away, and true colors finally come to light - but dreams die hard."

name: Mr. Sinister, Age of Apocalypse
effect: Pay 2 endurance, flip a coin ---> If you win the flip, recover target stunned character. Otherwise, KO that character at the start of the recovery phase this turn. Use only during the combat phase.

name: Reign of Apocalypse, Age of Apocalypse
effect:
To play, exhaust and Apocalypse you control.
KO target character if there are no characters with lower DEF in play.
"In this age, it is the Hand of Apocalypse that decides who is Chosen and who is Forgotten."

name: Rogue, Age of Apocalypse
effect: At the start of the combat phase, choose an opposing character. Rogue gains that character's powers and keywords this turn.
"Where ah'm standin', it looks like you're finished!"

name: Sabretooth, Age of Apocalypse
effect: Whenever an opposing character stuns another character you control, ready Sabretooth.
"I always knew you were a loser."

name: Spider-Man, Zombie
effect: {Activate}, KO Spider-Man ---> Target player exhausts a ready character he controls. At the start of the recovery phase this turn, return Spider-Man from his owner's KO'd pile to play under your control. Use only during the combat phase.

name: Sugar Man, Age of Apocalypse
effect:
Remove two character cards in your KO'd pile from the game ---> Put a +1 / +1 counter on Sugar Man. Use only once per turn.
Pay 1 endurance ---> KO target character you control.

name: Sunfire, Age of Apocalypse
effect: At the start of the recovery phase, stun each character with DEF 1 or less.
"Surrender now - unconditionally - or face the consequences."

name: Survival of the Fittest, Age of Apocalypse
effect: Ongoing: At the start of the recovery phase, put a +1 / +1 counter on each non-stunned character you control, then KO all stunned characters you control.
It stands as a warning to the world that his America offers no succor to the homeless or tempest-tossed.

name: The Infinites, army, Age of Apocalypse
effect:
The Infinites enters play with four +1/+1 counters.
At the start of the build phase, remove two +1/+1 counters from The Infinites.
"
" We are the Infinites, enforcers of Purity. Swords of Justice.

name: Wild Child, Age of Apocalypse
effect: At the start of the combat phase, exhaust Wild Child if you don't control another character with ATK 4 or greater.
"GRRRRR."

name: Wolverine, Age of Apocalypse
effect: Discard another Wolverine card ---> When Wolverine next becomes stunned this turn, recover him and put a +1 / +1 counter on him. Use only once per turn.

name: X-Men Assemble!, Age of Apocalypse
effect: Ongoing: Whenever an [X-Men Icon] character you control recovers, put a +1 / +1 counter on it.
"Tonight, one way or another, the Age of Apocalypse is over!"
